sentence.Network_en: The knee's coming on fine, I'm walking comfortably already.
sentence.Network_cn: 膝盖恢复得很好，我现在走路已经不疼了。

sentence.Network_en: He was comfortably seated in a soft reclining chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 他舒舒服服地坐在柔软的躺椅上。

sentence.Network_en: Take a comfortably wide stance and flex your knees a little.
sentence.Network_cn: 双腿适度分开站立，双膝稍稍弯曲。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... dependably 可靠地 comfortably 舒适地 changeably 可变地.
sit or recline comfortably ., 舒服地坐下或被放置.
comfortable 舒适的comfortably 安乐地comforter 慰问者
高考英语翻译专题_在线英语听力室 ... 整整齐齐 orderly / neatly 舒舒服服 comfortably 多姿多彩 colorful.

list.abs: 舒适与安全舒适舒适(comfort) 是个体在其环境中保持一种平静安宁的精神状态，是身心健康、没有疼痛、没有焦虑的轻松自在感觉。 …
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Comfortable 舒适的 Comfort 安慰 Responsible 负责的.
人教版高中英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... comfort n. 安慰； 慰问 comfortable a. 舒服的；安逸的；舒服自在的 27 comma n. 逗号.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Care 注意 Comfortable 舒适的 Comfort 安慰.

entry.def: If you do something comfortably, you do it easily.

example.ex: Only take upon yourself those things that you know you can manage comfortably...
example.tran: 只做那些自己知道能应付自如的事情。

example.ex: Three of the six have comfortably exceeded their normal life expectancy.
example.tran: 6人中已经有3人轻松超过了正常的预期寿命。

sentences.sentence: "she could have been lying comfortably in bed getting the same relief"
"she has been able to live comfortably since her husband died"

auth_sentence.content: Today, the UK sits comfortably within the group.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today, the UK sits comfortably within the group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today, the UK sits comfortably within the group.

auth_sentence.content: She settled herself more comfortably...giving a tweak to her...beret.
auth_sentence.res_content: She settled herself more comfortably...giving a tweak to her...beret.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She settled herself more comfortably...giving a tweak to her...beret.

auth_sentence.content: Alison...snugged down more comfortably in...bed and drifted off again.
auth_sentence.res_content: Alison...snugged down more comfortably in...bed and drifted off again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Alison...snugged down more comfortably in...bed and drifted off again.

sentences.en: He seated himself comfortably at the foot of the bed.
He settled himself more comfortably in his chair.
sentences.cn: 他使自己在椅子上坐得更舒服些。

sentences.en: He settled his briefcase comfortably in his lap.
sentences.cn: 他把公文包舒适地搁在大腿上。

sentences.en: Her head was resting comfortably against his chest.
sentences.cn: 她的头舒服地靠在他的胸前。

sentences.en: My car holds four people comfortably.
sentences.cn: 我的车子能舒服地坐四个人。
他的房间家具都很舒适。

sentences.en: I put a pillow on the saddle so that I could ride comfortably.
sentences.cn: 我在鞍上放了一个枕头,这样骑马时可以舒服些。

sentences.en: My brother is very comfortably off.He has a career in finance.
sentences.cn: 我的哥哥很富有,他从事金融业。

sentences.en: My brother is very comfortably off. He has a career in finance.
